graphql-special-query: Label on Special:Graphql for the Query field
graphql-special-variables: Label on Special:Graphql for the Variables field
graphql-special-result: Label on Special:Graphql for the results
graphql-page-error-nosource: Error that is thrown when page source is not specified.
graphql-page-error-multisource: Error that is thrown when multiple page sources are specified.
graphql-sandbox-jsonly: Displayed as an error message if the browser does not have JavaScript enabled.
graphql-schema-error-no-composite-fields:
Schema error when a field returns a object or union.
* $1 - Name of the type with the violation.
* $2 - Name of the type's field.
* $3 - Name of the type the field uses.
graphql-schema-error-missing-field-inter:
Schema error when a field is not a part of any interface implemented.
* $1 - Name of the type with the violation.
* $2 - Name of the type's field.
graphql-schema-error-modified-interface:
Schema error when an interface has been modified or is missing.
* $1 - Name of the missing or modified interface.
